summary: PUSH BUTTON START WOULD NOT ENGAGE - CAR WAS IN PARK- AFTER GETTING SHIFTER TO MOVE - CAR STARTED - TOOK IT TO DEALER REPLACED BRAKE LIGHT SWITCH - I SEE WHERE UK HAS  RECALLED 25K VEHICLES FOR THIS SAME PROBLEM INCLUDING SPORTAGE  NHTSA SHOULD ALSO ISSUE A RECALL ON THIS MODULE  WHILE WAITING ANOTHER CONSUMER REPORTED SAME PROBLEM BUT HAD A RECALL ON THEIRS.  *TR
